p: For inflammatory markers, venous blood samples were collected in plain tubes, allowed to clot for 15 min at room temperature, and then centrifuged at 2000 rpm for 15 min. Serum was removed and stored in 200 μL aliquots at –80°C until assays were performed. For the isolation of DNA, blood samples were collected using EDTA vacutainers (Becton Dickinson, BD Diagnostics, Oxford, UK). For the isolation of RNA, blood samples were collected in PAXgene Blood RNA Tubes (PreAnalytiX, Qiagen, UK). The collection tubes were stored at –80°C.
